title: "Zip Code Geocoding"
output: rmarkdown::github_document

```{r, eval = F, echo = F}
install.packages('tidygeocoder')
```
## Load Libraries

```{r}
library(tidygeocoder)
```

## Create sample list of zip codes to geocode

```{r, comment=NA}
zips <- c('33614', '75287', '39532')

cat(zips)
```
